name: SEEDS (younghabanero)
description:
-This is a project that is in alpha, still could be developed a lot more-

This is a game about tradition, and how we come to learn and understand tradition over time. Taking inspiration from the game Oware, a Ghanaian version of Mancala, the game is a series of puzzle sequences intended to illustrate how a traditional game is played - and what aspects of the game change, and what stays the same as it is passed into new generations.

Note - this game was designed for controller, specifically ps4 controller, so the icons may not match with pc. You can still play using 'Z' as R2, the arrow keys for navigation, and 'H' for pausing.
